title: Crystal Palace vs West Ham United LIVE : Premier League team news , line - ups and more
body_text:
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United LIVE: Premier League result, final score and reaction
Follow live coverage as Crystal Palace face West Ham in the Premier League today.
Wilfried Zaha returned to Crystal Palace's starting line-up for the first time since Roy Hodgson's return to the dugout on April 1.
It was one of three changes for the Eagles boss, with Joel Ward and Jeffrey Schlupp also returning to the starting line-up and Will Hughes, Luka Milivojevic and Albert Sambi Lokonga making way.
West Ham's Declan Rice made his 200th Premier League appearance on an afternoon that saw David Moyes make two changes. Emerson and Pablo Fornals came into his side, replacing Aaron Cresswell and Said Benrahma.
We will bring you all the action and updates from today's game in the live blog below:
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United LIVE: Premier League updates
FT! Crystal Palace 4-3 West Ham
72‚Äô GOAL! Aguerd scrambles corner over the line to give Hammers hope (CRY 4-3 WHU)
66‚Äô GOAL! Eze converts penalty to restore two-goal lead (CRY 4-2 WHU)
35‚Äô GOAL! Unmarked Antonio pulls one back at the back post (CRY 3-2 WHU)
29‚Äô GOAL! Schlupp robs Soucek and finishes under Fabianski (CRY 3-1 WHU)
19‚Äô GOAL! Zaha strikes at the back post as Zaha turn it around (CRY 2-1 WHU)
14‚Äô GOAL! Ayew hits quick equaliser from Olise pass (CRY 1-1 WHU)
9‚Äô GOAL! Soucek sweeps West Ham into the lead from a corner! (CRY 0-1 WHU)
Kick-off delayed by 15 minutes due to issues with the turnstiles at Selhurst Park
Crystal Palace FC 4 - 3 West Ham United FC
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:54
‚Äî Crystal Palace F.C. (@CPFC) April 29, 2023
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:53
That's all for today, goodbye!
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:52
That win lifts Palace up to 11th place, now on 40 points, and although they're not mathematically safe, that should be enough to keep them up. They travel to Tottenham next weekend. As for West Ham, they stay in 15th, five points above the drop zone. They play their game in hand against Manchester City in midweek.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:51
Palace see out a 4-3 win over West Ham. It was the visitors that took the lead in the ninth minute, with Soucek firing in from a corner, but three goals from Ayew, Zaha and Schlupp turned things on their head. Antonio did pull one back from another corner just before the break. Palace were the dominant side throughout and got their fourth from the spot after Eze slotted it in after winning the penalty. Aguerd glanced in another corner for West Ham, but they couldn't find an all-important equaliser.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:47
FULL-TIME: CRYSTAL PALACE 4-3 WEST HAM.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:46
A frustrating afternoon at Selhurst Park. pic.twitter.com/khAZMVZYwq
‚Äî West Ham United (@WestHam) April 29, 2023
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:46
Rice hooks it forward once more, but Palace clear their lines and Schlupp carries it far upfield to take the pressure off his team. West Ham are running out of time to get an equaliser.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:46
GET IN THERE ü§© #CPFC | #CRYWHU pic.twitter.com/UZZJRv9PLF
‚Äî Crystal Palace F.C. (@CPFC) April 29, 2023
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:42
Palace are trying to run the clock down a little more with their second change. It's Doucoure that's going off, with Miliveojvic replacing him.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:41
Cheick is replaced by Luka üí™
ü¶Ö 4-3 ‚öí#CPFC | #CRYWHU‚Äî Crystal Palace F.C. (@CPFC) April 29, 2023
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:41
Benrahma's heavy touch gets away from him and slows the pace of West Ham's latest attack. The visitors win another corner though, but this one is played over Soucek and Doucoure clears his lines.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:39
Into six minutes of stoppage time here, and West Ham are on the back foot once more. Eze and Olise link up well down the right side, but they're in no hurry to put it in the box at the moment.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:36
Andersen's big switch is cut out by Coufal, but he heads it straight to Schlupp. He tries to drive into the box, only to find his path blocked by Ogbonna.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:36
üîÅ Cornet comes on for Antonio.
ü¶Ö 4-3 ‚öíÔ∏è (89') | @Scope_Markets pic.twitter.com/71TaFZpbIt‚Äî West Ham United (@WestHam) April 29, 2023
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:36
Substitution Michail Gregory Antonio Gnaly Albert Maxwel Cornet
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:34
Palace win a corner and it's a better delivery from Olise this time. He sends it to the far post where Andersen directs a header on goal, but it's straight against Rice in front of him.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:31
Wilf is replaced by Edouard.
Quality today, @wilfriedzaha üëè#CPFC | #CRYWHU pic.twitter.com/UDDXNGsCfg‚Äî Crystal Palace F.C. (@CPFC) April 29, 2023
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:31
Substitution Dazet Wilfried Armel Zaha Odsonne √âdouard
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:31
Rice hooks it long upfield from a corner and Ward knocks it back towards his keeper but doesn't get a lot on it. Benrahma is chasing it down, but Mitchell does well to get back and shield it to Johnstone.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:28
Three of the last five instances of a team scoring three goals from corners in a single Premier League game have come against Palace.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:28
Let's give it everything these final ten minutes, Hammers! ‚öíÔ∏è
ü¶Ö 4-3 ‚öíÔ∏è (80') pic.twitter.com/4E5zzYYLYT‚Äî West Ham United (@WestHam) April 29, 2023
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:26
Ayew is down for Palace in need of treatment on his ankle after being caught by Ings. He's back to his feet quickly though, and he'll be able to carry on.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:25
Coufal puts another long throw-in into the box an Ogbonna flicks it on. West Ham have bodies in the box, but the defender can't pick one out, and Andersen clears his lines this time.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:23
West Ham are patiently playing out from the back again until Cresswell goes the big switch out to Bowen. He nods it down for Ings, but he can't in front of Guehi, who hooks it away.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:22
A VAR check confirms Aguerd's header stands! It comes from another Souƒçek flick on from a corner.
Big final 15 minutes coming up! ‚öíÔ∏è https://t.co/PRGbLr5KWV‚Äî West Ham United (@WestHam) April 29, 2023

ü¶Ö 4-3 ‚öíÔ∏è (73') pic.twitter.com/3m2fixtSfu‚Äî West Ham United (@WestHam) April 29, 2023

ü¶Ö 4-3 ‚öí#CPFC | #CRYWHU‚Äî Crystal Palace F.C. (@CPFC) April 29, 2023
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United

Goal Nayef Aguerd
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:20
Rice goes for a more direct route this time as he lifts it over the top towards Ings. He's judged to foul Mitchell as he goes up for the aerial challenge and another West Ham attack fizzles out.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:17
West Ham are keeping possession well, but it's all in their own half. Palace are happy to sit back and let them have it before pressing them quickly when they do advance forward.

ü¶Ö 4-2 ‚öíÔ∏è (65')‚Äî West Ham United (@WestHam) April 29, 2023

VAR is having a long look at all the differents angles of Aguerd's foul here and they can't see anything to overturn Craig Pawson's onfield decision. The penalty stands, much to West Ham's frustration.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:11
PENALTY TO PALACE! It's fizzed into Eze's feet on the edge of the box and his first touch just knocks it past Aguerd. The defender sticks out an arm which sends him down and the referee points to the spot after a moment's thought.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:11
Penalty to Crystal Palace.
ü¶Ö 3-2 ‚öíÔ∏è (63')‚Äî West Ham United (@WestHam) April 29, 2023

14:10
West Ham are still struggling to get upfield when they do win possession back. Benrahma has space to run into down the left but tries to cut inside instead, only to run straight into Ward.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:10
Happy to see him back, Palace fans? üî•#CPFC | #CRYWHU pic.twitter.com/Ue2bqsXhE3
‚Äî Crystal Palace F.C. (@CPFC) April 29, 2023
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:08
It's another poor delivery from Olise on a corner, but it's worked back out to him by Ward. He clips his second attempt into the six-yard box, but Soucek gets in front of Ayew to clear it.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:05
Yellow Card Vladim√≠r Coufal
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:04
West Ham found themselves behind at half-time in a Premier League away game having scored the first goal for the first time since November 2009 against Hull City (3-2 down at the break, finished 3-3).
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:01
‚ù§Ô∏èüíô#CPFC | #CRYWHU pic.twitter.com/AcyU7vCsbo
‚Äî Crystal Palace F.C. (@CPFC) April 29, 2023
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:01
GREAT SAVE! Ayew gets the better of Aguerd as he spins away from it and tees up Olise just outside the box. He takes it around Cresswell before curling a shot towards the far top corner, and Fabianski stretches to tip it over.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
14:00
Olise tries to shake off Cresswell with some clever footwork and gets a yard on him to swing in a cross. It's a poor one though, and it sails over everyone and harmlessly out of play.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:58
West Ham break quickly on the counter, but their passing is still letting them down when they get into Palace's half. Bowen tries to slide it forward for Antonio, but it's behind him.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:56
Olise's free-kick from the right is only half-cleared by West Ham, and the hosts work it out to Zaha on the left. He pulls it back to Schlupp inside the D, but he's off-balance as he strikes it, and it's a comfortable save for Fabianski.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:55
üîÅ A second change down the left with Benrahma on for Fornals.
ü¶Ö 3-2 ‚öíÔ∏è (46') | @Scope_Markets pic.twitter.com/tfIIJKailG‚Äî West Ham United (@WestHam) April 29, 2023

Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:53
Back for the second half.
Let's get back into this, Hammers ‚öíÔ∏è‚Äî West Ham United (@WestHam) April 29, 2023
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:52
West Ham get us back underway for the second half!
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:52
Substitution Emerson Palmieri dos Santos Aaron William Cresswell
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:48
Palace were the better side, but Hodgson will still be looking for improvements in their defending, especially from corners. They look a real threat every time they go forward though. Moyes' frustration with his own side's defensive work was clear to see and he'll be urging for much more from them after the break.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:43
We would like to sincerely apologise to supporters who were affected by our turnstile failure earlier today, which led to the delay to kick-off. A full investigation is underway.#CPFC | #CRYWHU
‚Äî Crystal Palace F.C. (@CPFC) April 29, 2023
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:42
It was a brilliant first half of football, which sees Palace leading West Ham 3-2 at the break. It was the visitors that took the lead with the first shot of the game as Soucek fired in from a corner after Olise's poor clearance. Palace quickly turned it around though, with Ayew equalising just five minutes before Zaha fired them ahead. Schlupp added a third, pouncing on a mistake from Soucek, but Antonio pulled one back not long after when he thumped in a header.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:38
HALF-TIME: CRYSTAL PALACE 3-2 WEST HAM.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:37
A dramatic first-half, but we lead at the break ‚úÖ#CPFC | #CRYWHU pic.twitter.com/k8Hm1TF7T9
‚Äî Crystal Palace F.C. (@CPFC) April 29, 2023
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:37
A frantic first half, with work to be done in the second. pic.twitter.com/LhIYLNiAmn
‚Äî West Ham United (@WestHam) April 29, 2023
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:35
BLOCK! Olise's free-kick pinballs around in the box and falls to Schlupp, who lets it bounce before hitting the half-volley. It's blocked by Aguerd in the middle, and Andersen can't control it on the rebound.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:35
Emerson slid in on Olise and though he got the ball, a free-kick goes against him for the follow-through. West Ham aren't happy with the decision, but their arguments won't change the referee's mind.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:32
Palace win a free-kick just inside their own half, but it doesn't stop Guehi from trying to look for Olise's run between the defenders. He just gets too much on it though, and Fabianski comfortably collects.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:30
Another sloppy pass from the visitors sees them lose possession on the halfway line, and Doucoure spins before spreading it out to Zaha again. He drives past Coufal before pulling it back from the byline, but Ogbonna just gets in front of Ayew.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:29
üòçüòçüòç#CPFC | #CRYWHU pic.twitter.com/qdhpDZBZCD
‚Äî Crystal Palace F.C. (@CPFC) April 29, 2023
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:28
Palace switch it neatly from right to left once more, with Zaha picking out Mitchell's overlapping run. He has two in the middle to aim for, but his low cross is cut out by Coufal on the near side.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:26
Ayew has now reached 50 direct goal involvements in the Premier League (33 goals and 17 assists); he has four goal involvements in his last six games, one more than in his previous 33 combined.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:25
There are half-hearted shouts for a penalty from the Palace fans behind the goal as Eze goes down under pressure from Ogbonna. There isn't a lot in it though and the referee points for a goal-kick.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:23
Antonio gets us back into it, heading home from a Souƒçek flick on at a corner. https://t.co/MzmWljZ3BZ

Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:22
GOOD CHANCE! Zaha fizzes another good cross into the box and it falls to Schlupp in the middle. He lifts it towards the near top corner, but it's just too high as it sails over the bar.

Come for the finish, stay for the celebration scenes üòç#CPFC | #CRYWHU pic.twitter.com/HGIrXDgzjH

West Ham just can't keep hold of the ball when they do get into Palace's half, and their frustration is starting to show. They're chasing the hosts around the field, but can't get close to them.

13:17
Schlupp scores.

Goal Jeffrey Schlupp
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:15
CLOSE! Another corner is played short by Palace and Zaha lifts a cross into the far post from the left. Guehi rises highest to meet it, and his header has beaten Fabianski, but it lands on the roof of the net.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:13
Antonio wins it back high upfield and knocks it down for Bowen. He can't pick out a cross so helps it out to Coufal, who clips it into the near post. Antonio sends his header flying high over the bar.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
13:13
Back in the XI. Back in the goals.#CPFC | #CRYWHU pic.twitter.com/82EftlhPcr

Eze's clearance goes straight to Aguerd, and between him and Rice, they manage to get it back upfield. Antonio cushions a header down for Soucek on the edge of the D, but he snatches at the shot and it's a comfortable save for Johnstone.

Zouma was caught by Ayew's studs when he scored the goal, and he's down holding his ankle. It was an accidental collision, but it looks like it's going to be the end of his game.

13:00
Palace win a free-kick on the right, but Eze's delivery is cleared by the first man. They manage to win it back quickly with Zaha recycling it from the left, but his cross is over everyone in the box.
Crystal Palace vs West Ham United
12:58
Palace are looking to regain the control they had in the opening minutes and Schlupp spots Zaha with space to run into down the left. He gets too much on the pass though, and the forward can't keep it in play.
